entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 16.
